segments.text: Observing this indoor scene, it's a typical kitchen moment gone wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is absorbed in her dish-drying routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet on, sink full, overflow starting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming at her feet, no reaction from her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's adventure on the stool catches my eye.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate and dipping into cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That unstable stool makes me worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's posture shows she's in on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Arm raised, palm open for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage impending on the lower cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside view is serene, bushes and fence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back, letting in the day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the kids are having fun, but it's risky.
segments.speaker: PAR
